name: Jeff
text: Great day on the water! Peter was a great CaptainüòÄ

name: Greg
text: Thank you Peter for an excellent week sailing around Mallorca. Peter was an easy going, thoughtful skipper with great knowledge of good bays to visit and places to see. Nothing was ever too much for Peter. Highly recommended.

name: Laura
text: We had an amazing day! Peter was great, so laid back and accommodating

name: Adnan
text: Amazing and memorable trip for our family and friends. Peter is an excellent chef as well. Highly recommend a day trip with Peter.

name: Karl
text: We hade a great time with Peter . Amazing day

name: Hannes
text: Everything perfect. Great boat. Peter is a very experienced captain.

name: Morten
text: Peter was a perfect host. High level of communication and a very professional approach to sailing. 5 stars. Highly recommended.

name: Lene
text: We had a really great day with Peter on his nice catamaran. Peter is very pleasant to be with and he knows the area very well. We will definitely recommend him.

name: Stine
text: We had the most wonderful day with Peter! He is so friendly and we felt safe all day. The boat is so nice. We will definitely book with Peter again.

name: Maikel
text: Top boot top schipper. Heerlijke dag gehad!

name: Jan
text: Great host, great boat, great experience. Highly recommended.

name: Inigo
text: Peter was an amazing host and skipper. He was very flexible and accommodating. The boat was in perfect condition and we had a great time.

name: Alexander
text: Peter is a great captain and host. The boat is in excellent condition and we had a fantastic day. Highly recommended.

name: Sarah
text: We had an amazing time on Peter's boat. He was very professional and friendly. The boat was very clean and comfortable. We would highly recommend him.

name: Michael
text: Peter is a great guy and a very experienced skipper. We had a wonderful day on his catamaran. Everything was perfect. Thanks Peter!

name: Saskia
text: Great day, great boat, great captain! Peter is very relaxed and knows the best spots. We had a lot of fun. Highly recommended.

name: Thomas
text: Excellent boat and very professional skipper. We had a perfect day on the water. Highly recommended.

name: Claudia
text: Peter was a fantastic host. The boat was perfect for our group and we had an amazing day. Thank you Peter!

name: Daniel
text: Everything was perfect. Peter is a great captain and the boat is very comfortable. We had a wonderful day.

name: Anna
text: We had a great time with Peter. The boat was in excellent condition and the service was top notch. Highly recommended.

name: Markus
text: Peter is a very friendly and professional skipper. The boat was clean and well maintained. We had a fantastic day.

name: Julia
text: Amazing day on the water! Peter was a great host and the boat was perfect. We will definitely come back.

name: Stefan
text: Great experience, professional skipper, beautiful boat. Everything was just perfect. Highly recommended.

name: Lisa
text: We had a wonderful day with Peter. He is a great host and very knowledgeable about the area. The boat was perfect.

name: Kevin
text: Top service, top boat, top skipper. We had a lot of fun and would highly recommend Peter.

name: Melanie
text: Peter was a fantastic host and the boat was in great condition. We had an amazing day. Thank you!

text: Very professional and friendly skipper. The boat was very clean and comfortable. We had a great time.

text: Great day on the water! Peter is a very nice guy and knows the best spots. Highly recommended.

name: Peter
text: Excellent day, great boat and a very friendly host. Everything was perfect. Highly recommended.

text: Super nice boat and a very professional skipper. We had a lot of fun. Highly recommended.

text: Very cool day on the water. Peter is a great guy and the boat is really nice. We'll be back!

text: Peter is a top skipper. The boat was in excellent condition and the communication was very easy. Highly recommended.

text: Ein unvergesslicher Tag mit Perer auf dem Wasser? Sehr empfehlenswert! Wir kommen wieder? Danke Peter! Wir sehen uns pronto?
